content.question: The status of Macau and Hong Kong as shown on Map 2 would become a source of renewed international tension in the last decades of the twentieth century primarily because of

choices.label: Chinese nationalists’ takeover of the island of Taiwan
China’s growing economic power following the implementation of liberalization policies
Japan’s rearmament following the end of United States occupation
India’s seizure of the former Portuguese colony of Goa by military force

content.answer: China’s growing economic power following the implementation of liberalization policies

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
